resources.string: Fulfill the form below to create your account and starts your adventure. You will receive an email to confirm your account, then you NEED TO USE AN VALID EMAIL to play Naruto Game!
You will receive an email soon
The given password is invalid. [Password should be at least 6 characters]
The confirm password field is required
The \'Password\' and \'Confirm Password\' fields are different
If you do not remember your password, type your email account below and click \"send\". In a few minutes you will receive your new password
In few minutes you will receive an email to change your password. Only the link sent to you can change the password. Remember: copy and keep safe your password.
Your info was changed with success.
Keep your account info updated and correct, so we can send prizes if you win something in the game.
When you share your account info with others, you are in risk of they change your password, and you will lose your account.
Email has not been verified yet
O description do seu character não pode ter mais de 10 caractéres
O name do seu character só pode conter letras, números e underlines

Your character is capable of attribute training since Level 1, but this training has a daily limit. The more you train, better will be your results in battles, in dojo NPC even with your enemies. The days NOT trained, will be cumulated: For example, if you can\'t train tuesday and wednesday, at thursday you can train the sum of tuesday, wednesday and thursday. At Tuesdays, the week limit is renewed, even you do not have trained, then, ever try train your week limit until mondays. The Attribute Training is key to have a good character, so, never forget to training it
You can do the Manual Training many times a day.
I WANT TO BE A TEAM LEADER
Be a Leader is a important thing, help your team mates to grow and evolve in the game to be a helpful ninja to our village. The reward is 5% more experience per ninja defeated in World Map.
Select an method to create an Team
The name of Team can\'t be empty
I WANT TO BE A MEMBER
Choose the Team and click Participate to send a request to join this Team
When the Training Bar be filled, you will receive one point to distribute in your Attributes! But this will become a challenge for you!
All Ninjas can train your daily limit of training normally, for those who can\'t train the limit on the same day, can train on the next day and consecutively.
You don\'t have enough Chakra and Stamina for this training.
Do you really want to delete this ninja?
You cannot remove this character while logged in!
• You\'ve played in lucky ninja today!
• You do not have enough ryous
• You do not have enough credits
• You haven\'t played the entire week yet.
Super Noodles reinforced for use in the intervals of tasks ninjas
Seafood Ramen, specially spiced with soy sauce
Shrimp ramen, specially spiced with soy sauce
Ramen of vegetables, with soy paste
Ramen of vegetables, especially temperate with soy sauce
Ramen of vegetables, spiced with salt
Pork ramen, spiced with soy sauce
Seafood Ramen, specially spiced with soy sauce
Ticket de Suporte Criado com Sucesso
BEM VINDO AO SISTEMA DE SUPORTE
Bem vindo ao Novo Sistema do Suporte, onde tentaremos solucionar seu problema. Basta abrir um Ticket de Suporte informando o que houve e tentaremos te ajudar.
Have an image of the problem? Use the file field below to add it
A fast movement to avoid attacks
A kick with enough power to crush rocks
Copy jutsu, the user uses this jutsu to copy anything (people, objects, etc. ..) and thus use this method to attack the opponent is distracted.
This makes genjutsu ninja disappear for a few moments, giving his victim the idea that out extremely fast, meanwhile he can hide or even attack the target.
The ninja throwing stars with lines and holding the controls to attack the enemy.
First pill, the green, which ensures extra physical powers. There are no side effects.
First pill, the green, which ensures extra physical powers. There are no side effects.
Expels needles hidden in his mouth
While the enemy still in the air, the user smack him down with a kick.
Uses the shoulder as attack, throwing the opponent against a wall or making him lose his balance
Yellow is the second pill that guarantees superior physical abilities. There are likely to cause low level side effects.
Yellow is the second pill that guarantees superior physical abilities. There are likely to cause low level side effects.
The ninja throws kunai at the enemy\'s arm, softening his arm and can control it.
The ninja throws kunai at the enemy\'s arm, softening his arm and can control it.
Similar to Soufuushasan no Tachi, the ninja uses several kunai and shuriken stuck in lines to trap and attack the enemy from multiple directions.
The various ninja shoots shurikens, throwing stars and more hidden in the shadows of them, who show themselves to get close to the enemy, catching him by surprise.
Similar to Soufuushasan no Tachi, the ninja uses several kunai and shuriken stuck in lines to trap and attack the enemy from multiple directions.
The ninja throws several needles of a shield.
The ninja can control the weapons of the opponent, making it vulnerable.
The ninja can control the weapons of the opponent, making it vulnerable.
The ninja throws an umbrella up and makes it rain needles.
Senbons using a launcher, ninja shoots poisonous needles at the enemy.
Creates a cloud of nails that attack the opponent with only the power of chakra.
Clonning Jutsu. Creates clones of the user, often used in close combat.
Clonning Jutsu. Creates clones of the user, often used in close combat.
Creates a clone used to distract the opponent.
Creates a clone used to distract the opponent.
When you throw a shuriken, another is thrown in the shadow of the first.
Basic Ninjutsu where the ninja is camouflaged with a sleek, mingling with some wall.
When in danger the ninja quickly replaces your body by inanimate objects.
Genjutsu technique that creates a series of false attacks in order to confuse the enemy, several copies of the user are facing the enemy surrounding him.
A basic genjutsu where the ninja touches the hand on the shoulder or region near the head of another person and makes sleep soundly.
A basic genjutsu where the ninja touches the hand on the shoulder or region near the head of another person and makes sleep soundly.
When the enemy touches or sees the object, he feels an irresistible attraction for the object, doing everything to get the same, including abandoning friends or fall into a trap.
Technique that consists in making the enemy enters a trance state, and thus, the shinobi can interrogate it to find out secrets, or even kill him.
This ability serves to break jutsus that require a lot of concentration or calmly.
Using sound, ninja projects his voice, mistaking its location.
This makes genjutsu ninja disappear for a few moments, giving his victim the idea that out extremely fast, meanwhile he can hide or even attack the target.
This makes genjutsu ninja disappear for a few moments, giving his victim the idea that out extremely fast, meanwhile he can hide or even attack the target.
This makes genjutsu ninja disappear for a few moments, giving his victim the idea that out extremely fast, meanwhile he can hide or even attack the target.
A gyratory flying kick, followed by a tripping kick.
Learn new Jutsus to fight in duels and the best level for that scope the requirements of each jutsu.
(jutsu that are not in the same class of your character have folded requirements)
Você se esforçou e aprendeu o jutsu
Keep it up and learn new jutsus to grow strong!
You do not have enough %s to train that Jutsu

All Ninjas have a Purchase Biweekly Limit 40 Ranged Weapons , it was implemented in the game so that the use of these weapons is done in a strategic manner in the fighting. The Reset always happen on the 1st and 15th of every month.
Using this scroll, your character will be teleported to the Leaf map.
Using this scroll, your character will be teleported to the Hot Springs map.
Using this scroll, your character will be teleported to the Snow map.
Using this scroll, your character will be teleported to the Waterfall map.
Using this scroll, your character will be teleported to the Rain map.
Using this scroll, your character will be teleported to the Sound map.
Using this scroll, your character will be teleported to the Akatsuki map.
Using this scroll, your character will be teleported to the Cloud map.
Using this scroll, your character will be teleported to the Stone map.
Using this scroll, your character will be teleported to the Mist map.
Using this scroll, your character will be teleported to the Sand map.
Using this scroll, your character will be teleported to the Grass map.
All Ninja have an daily limit of battles against NPC\'s in game, that limit is 10 battles. This limit is renewed every day at Midnight (00:00 hour)
You can\'t fight on this terrible health, recover yourself an try again
You have lost the battle.\n\nGo to
YOU WERE BADLY INJURED AND IS RESTING!
You have lost the fight by inactivity\n
Because they were both very tired, the match ended in a draw!\n\nGo to

Nicely Done! You have won the battle!
Your reward is RY$ %d and %d experience points

Go to back
This operation is sensitive and requires recent authentication. Log in again before retrying this request.

Welcome student. Today we are going to start your life as a ninja. If you really want to become one of the best ninjas in your village, you will have to study hard and practice a lot. Start studying now and follow the necessary steps to become a Genin.
Who said your walk to becoming a Shinobi would be easy? You still have a lot to learn, go to the second lesson.
You\'re doing well! Some more lessons and maybe you can become a Genin. Continue your arduous journey of success.
Congratulations, you are doing great, you are learning fast and soon you will become a great ninja! Keep studying.
Training is everything. A ninja who does not train has a weak mind and body. You need to train your skills whenever you can. Keep learning, reading is also part of your learning.

You are close to becoming a Genin, but you still need to complete some classes. Be patient as it takes many years to become a \"Kage\" to become the village leader. Who knows if you study hard you will not become the \"Kage\" of your village.
To become one of the best ninjas you must also be polite to your companions, respect others and always help. These are also important steps in your journey to becoming a Ninja.
Who would say! Not long ago you were just a simple student and now you are close to becoming a Genin. Congratulations, you are doing very well and there is little left to become a great Ninja.
I can see that you have been practicing a lot and, with that, you have become stronger. You are correctly following the ninja path and soon you will be receiving your bandana.

Like an old Sensei, I always get emotional when a student graduates! You went through many things and overcame all obstacles. Now I have nothing more to teach. Let\'s do your last lesson and with that, you will be very close to becoming a ninja. Keep practicing for the Genin exam. Train your skills as much as you can and very soon you will be becoming a Genin, then receiving your Bandana.
Your ninja walk is going well. Congratulations your first lesson is finished!
Your ninja walk is going well. Congratulations for another finished lesson.

This was the last lesson. From now on you must follow alone, to form as a Genin you must enter battles in the DOJO and train a lot in the academy, once you have the minimum requirements go to GRADUATIONS at the Academy and get ready to become a Genin.
As a reward you will receive:
Do you really want to cancel this mission? All your time spent so far will be wasted.
Congratulations you just created your character in Naruto Game.\nSelect your character and start your training right now
BB Target Ninja\n( Yellow Background Color )

The formulas are displayed according to your class, for example Stamina, if your class is TAI, obviously the TAI points will benefit you more than the points in BUK, if you were BUK, of course the points in BUK would be worth more.
After making the payment the nurse brought in the designated specialist and you were completely healed.
Pay for quality care, the specialist costs %d Ryous and you are immediately cured.
Or you can wait for a free medical ninja on duty to save you, recovering your character completely in a maximum of 10 minutes. (20% of your total attributes every 2 minutes)
Releases training attributes. Clears the daily exp earned on the teams. Renew daily NPC combats and duel training counters.
The selected jutsu is not yet available

By logging in daily you can collect rewards for your character. You must log into the game for 8 days in a row to get all the rewards and start over. If you do not log in one of the days, the counter will return to the first day.
It is not your turn to attack!
You don\'t have enough Chakra and/or Stamina to use this jutsu.

Here you can duel against opponents from all the villages in the game, automatically the game will try to form a battle against an opponent of the same level as yours, if you don\'t have it at the moment, we will give you a target with 1 level less or more than your.
Do you want to change your character\'s image to chosen?
